data.actual_result: The outline comes in late on top and on the right (depending on position), most notably when preview is on right side
data.expected_result: The appearing outline should come in evenly, like when the preview is in top left
data.short_description: [90% Zoom] Outline when hovering over video preview is delayed for some sides
data.steps_to_repro: - get into a video call/screenshare with your best friend! - go to a different channel/dm/server to see the video preview - put it to any place other than default (top left) - hover over it and observe
